DOC.brief_summary: This study pilot 3-month clinical trial investigated feasibility , effectiveness , acceptability use Track Health function Veterans Health Administration 's patient health record effect positive physical activity ( PA ) dietary intake lifestyle sample 38 overweight obese Veterans prediabetes . Baseline three-month post-intervention outcome measure two main domain : objective ( e.g. , weight ) subjective ( e.g. , self-efficacy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Use Track Health Function MyHealthevet Personal Health Record
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot clinical trial use single-group design test feasibility , effectiveness , acceptability use Track Health ( TH ) function My HealtheVet , VA 's patient health record ( PHR ) , tool effect positive physical activity ( PA ) dietary intake lifestyle overweight obese Veterans prediabetes . Baseline three-month post-intervention outcome measure two main domain : objective ( PA measure accelerometer , diet , weight , abdominal circumference , BMI , blood pressure ) subjective ( self-efficacy , intent adhere lifestyle change , patient activation ) . Assessments , include screen inclusion exclusion criterion , physiological measurement , administration questionnaire , train use two critical feature TH function -- use Journals enter dietary PA data use Vitals + Readings enter weight track physiological measure -- take place place across four visit study site , Veterans Administration Medical Center Miami . The investigator hypothesize PHR-based intervention would demonstrate improvement increase , respectively objective subjective domain measure . The investigator also hypothesize engagement study participant MHV would demonstrate meeting target criterion regard make entry PHR 's TH function , participant would satisfy intervention .
